DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy 6 month upper arm proprioceptive pressure therapy Assisting Hand Assessment ( `` AHA '' ) performance Cerebral Palsy ( CP ) . To perform study , 80 CP patient age 5 10 year old include multicentric , double blind , prospective parallel-group randomize study . Treatment pressure therapy use LYCRA® compressive sleeve initially use burn therapy . Primary outcome increase 60 % AHA performance . The secondary outcome increase Quality Upper Extremity Skill Test ( QUEST ) , quality life improve Somatosensory Evoked Potentials ( SEP ) .
